newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistani stocks close higher on short-covering.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani stocks close higher on short-covering.

text.p: Pakistani stocks closed higher on Thursday owing to short-covering before the Friday-Saturday weekend, dealers said.
The Karachi Stock Exchange 100-share index closed 17.90 points, or 1.32 percent, up at 1,371.24 amid 119 losers and 109 gainers.

Short covering in six big scrips, which carry heavy weight on the index, pushed the index up before the weekend, dealer Ali Raza said. HUBCO gained 0.50 rupee to 32.35, PTCL 0.20 to 25.70, ICI 0.25 to 17.75, Dewan Salman 0.60 to 33.40, PSO 8.00 to 269 and Fauji Fertilizer 4.00 to 72. -- Ibrahim Khan 9221-5685192
